title: Reduce UI component size from large to medium

requirements.summary: Reduce the size of UI components from large to medium throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: All UI components display at medium size instead of large
Text, buttons, cards, and form inputs are proportionally scaled down
Layout remains coherent and usable at the reduced size
Spacing and padding are adjusted to match medium scale

file_operations.description: Adjust base typography scale and spacing variables to reduce overall component size. Reduce base font sizes, heading scales, and default spacing units to achieve medium-scale UI. Update any large-scale utility classes to medium equivalents.

Adjust Tailwind theme configuration to reduce default sizing scales. Update fontSize presets, spacing scale, and any custom size configurations to support medium-scale components throughout the application.
Reduce header height, navigation spacing, and container padding to medium scale. Adjust logo size and navigation item padding to match the new medium sizing scheme.
Reduce logo image dimensions and text size to medium scale. Adjust spacing and glow effects proportionally to maintain visual coherence at the smaller size.
Reduce card padding, icon sizes, balance text sizes, and spacing between elements to medium scale. Ensure USD values and labels are proportionally smaller while maintaining readability.
Reduce total assets text size, currency selector dimensions, and container padding to medium scale. Adjust the overall card height and internal spacing to match the new sizing scheme.
Reduce button padding, font size, and rounded corners to medium scale. Adjust disabled and hover state styling proportionally.
Reduce text size, padding, border width, and glow effect intensity to medium scale. Ensure the component remains readable and the copy functionality is easily accessible.
Reduce dialog dimensions, input field sizes, button sizes, and internal spacing to medium scale. Ensure the modal remains centered and usable at the smaller size.
Reduce dialog dimensions, form input heights, label sizes, button dimensions, and spacing to medium scale. Maintain validation message visibility at the smaller size.
Reduce popover dimensions, list item heights, search input size, and spacing to medium scale. Ensure the contact list remains scrollable and clickable at the smaller size.
Reduce radio button sizes, label text sizes, and spacing between options to medium scale. Maintain clear visual distinction between selected and unselected states.
Reduce alert component padding, text sizes, and icon dimensions to medium scale. Ensure the refresh button remains easily clickable.
Reduce alert component padding, text sizes, and spacing to medium scale. Maintain readability of fee information and processing time details.
Reduce page container padding, spacing between balance cards, and section headings to medium scale. Ensure the grid layout adapts gracefully to the smaller component sizes.
Reduce form field heights, button sizes, step indicator dimensions, and page padding to medium scale. Adjust spacing between form sections and ensure validation messages remain visible.
Reduce address display card sizes, QR code dimensions if present, copy button sizes, and text sizes to medium scale. Maintain clear separation between Principal and Bitcoin address sections.
Reduce contact list item heights, button sizes, table/list padding, and action button dimensions to medium scale. Ensure add/edit/delete actions remain easily accessible.
Reduce transaction list item heights, filter button sizes, icon dimensions, and table cell padding to medium scale. Maintain timestamp and amount readability at the smaller size.
Reduce form input heights, button sizes, text areas, and page padding to medium scale. Ensure JSON argument input and method name fields remain usable.
Reduce error message text sizes, reload button dimensions, and container padding to medium scale. Ensure error details remain readable.
Reduce loading spinner size, error message dimensions, and any app-level spacing to medium scale. Ensure loading and error states are proportionally sized with the rest of the application.
